name: Các cụm từ thông dụng (Common Phrases)

words.example: I need to apply for a job soon.

words.vietnamese: Có một cuộc phỏng vấn xin việc
words.example: She will have a job interview tomorrow morning.
After graduating, he hopes to get a job quickly.

words.vietnamese: Làm việc toàn thời gian/bán thời gian
words.example: Many students work part-time to earn extra money.
Sometimes I have to work overtime to finish projects.
We plan to take a vacation next summer.
It's tough to be unemployed for a long time.
After college, she started to look for a job in marketing.
